requests.name: Create a Complex Record (Header & Details)
requests.description: Demonstrates the creation of an AR Invoice Batch

requests.name: Discover Available Resources
requests.description: Demonstrates retrieving metadata to list all available resources

requests.name: Delete a Record
requests.description: Demonstrates the deletion of an AR Customer

requests.url: http://localhost/Sage300WebApi/v1.0/-/SAMLTD/AR/ARCustomers?$count=true&$filter=BalanceDueInCustomerCurrency gt 1000.00 and DateOfLastInvoice gt 2016-12-31T12:00:00Z and AccountType eq 'BalanceForward'
requests.name: Get Records using a Complex Filter
requests.description: Demonstrates the retrieval of a set of Customers based on a complex filter dealing with a dollar amount, a date and a presentation item.

requests.name: Create a Record
requests.description: Demonstrates the creation of an AR Customer

requests.name: Get Records using a Range
requests.description: Demonstrates the retrieval of a set of customers by specifying the offset and count

requests.name: Invoke Process Endpoint
requests.description: Demonstrates invoking the "Create GL Batch" process in AR

requests.name: Dealing with Errors
requests.description: Demonstrates a typical error message payload

requests.name: Get Records using a Filter
requests.description: Demonstrates the retrieval of a set of Customers based on a filter

requests.name: Get Records
requests.description: Demonstrates the retrieval of customers (does not return records beyond the first page)

requests.name: Get Record by Key
requests.description: Demonstrates the retrieval of a Customer using the customer number

requests.name: Update a Record
requests.description: Demonstrates the update of an AR Customer
